personal.name: Mann Gupta
personal.title: Software Engineer & AI/ML Developer
personal.bio:
Hey ðŸ‘‹
I'm Mann, a fast-learning and detail-oriented Software Engineer with hands-on experience in backend development, AI/ML, DevOps, and full-stack engineering. Skilled in designing scalable systems, optimizing cloud infrastructure, and building intelligent automation pipelines. Passionate about solving complex problems through clean architecture and continuous learning.

current.institution: Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Petroleum Technology (RGIPT), Jais, U.P., India

achievements: Achieved 1900+ LeetCode rating, showcasing consistent programming excellence

experience.description: Optimized and migrated Amazon EKS cluster for 15+ production microservices, improving scalability and reducing costs. Developed and integrated Python-based microservices (RESTful architecture), enhancing modularity and communication. Implemented auto-scaling in Amazon EKS, reducing operational costs by 50%. Rolled out WIRequest across 10+ microservices with StatsD and Grafana, enabling real-time monitoring.

Developed a Chatbot system enabling interactive querying across various file formats, delivering accurate and rapid responses directly from large documents. Utilized the Agentic AI framework to create two specialized bots â€” a Customer Support Bot that resolves user queries autonomously and an HR Bot that handles employee inquiries, reducing HR workload and improving response efficiency.

Designed machine learning models to filter and cluster LLM-generated keywords, improving data accuracy and organization. Formulated a relevance scoring algorithm to enhance keyword precision and processing efficiency. Built and tested web endpoints using Postman, resolving frontend issues and boosting performance. Proposed cost-optimization strategies for keyword generation workflows, reducing computational overhead.

projects.title: Pneumonia Detection using CNN
projects.description: Designed a CNN model achieving 92% accuracy in pneumonia classification, improving diagnostic reliability. Optimized training with batch processing and GPU acceleration, reducing training time. Evaluated performance using precision, recall, and F1-score for robust detection results.

projects.title: EduTube â€“ Live Streaming Educational App
projects.description: Engineered a secure authentication and profile management system supporting real-time user access. Streamlined deployments through CI/CD automation with GitHub Actions and Docker. Created AI-filtered content feeds to enable distraction-free learning environments.

projects.title: Multi-Tenant Project Management System
projects.description: Architected a multi-tenant task management platform inspired by Jira, enabling team-based project tracking and task assignment across isolated tenant workspaces. Implemented role-based access control, project analytics, and real-time task updates, improving collaboration and visibility for multiple organizations. Designed scalable backend APIs using Node.js with TypeScript and integrated MongoDB for efficient tenant data isolation and performance.

projects.title: Course Differentiator
projects.description: Developed a platform to aggregate and analyze AI/ML, JEE, and NEET course data from multiple websites using web scraping (BeautifulSoup). Built an AI-powered chatbot that provides personalized course recommendations based on user skills and preferences. Designed an interactive React-based UI and backend in PHP to streamline data presentation and enhance decision-making for learners.

projects.title: Job Scheduling and Management System
projects.description: Engineered a C++ scheduling module to manage and prioritize multiple project jobs based on time and budget constraints. Implemented custom data structures including Trie, Min/Max Heap, and Red-Black Tree to achieve efficient data storage and retrieval. Optimized algorithmic performance for large-scale job handling and computation-heavy workflows.

projects.title: Player-Ball Interaction Analysis
projects.description: Designed a computer vision pipeline to analyze player interactions with the ball in sports videos, extracting touch counts, ball rotation, and player velocity. Built a biomechanical analysis model with dynamic overlays to visualize player-ball interactions and performance metrics in real time. Demonstrated applied skills in computer vision, multimodal analytics, and deep learning for sports performance tracking.

internship.preferredLocation: Remote preferred; open to relocation anywhere in India
internship.workStyle: Fast learner, collaborative team player, and proactive problem solver. Known for adapting quickly to new technologies, maintaining attention to detail, and driving efficient, scalable solutions in team-oriented environments.
internship.goals: Join an innovative team building scalable solutions. I want to contribute to meaningful projects while growing my skills in enterprise-level development, cloud infrastructure, and AI/ML systems.
